snippet.title: Everyone Must Die: A Western Standoff - Steam Next Fest: October 2023 Demo
snippet.description:
Everyone Must Die: A Western Standoff is a puzzle game set in the Wild West that's inspired by the chaos and uncertainty found in Mexican standoffs. Inflict as much carnage as possible and make sure all the participants die by changing the environment around them with a plethora of unique tools.

Everyone Must Die: A Western Standoff (C) Armchair Developers
Release Date: 2023

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #steamnextfest #steamnextfestoctober2023 #everyonemustdie #everyonemustdieawesternstandoff #awesternstandoff #western
